skyux_alert_close._description: Screen reader text for the close button on alerts

skyux_alert_sr_attention._description: Screen reader text when the alert contains info that needs attention

skyux_alert_sr_caution._description: Screen reader text when the alert contains info that needs caution

skyux_alert_sr_completed._description: Screen reader text when the alert indicates a completed status

skyux_alert_sr_danger._description: Screen reader text when the alert contains info with a danger status

skyux_alert_sr_error._description: Screen reader text when the alert contains an error

skyux_alert_sr_important_info._description: Screen reader text when the alert contains important information

skyux_alert_sr_important_warning._description: Screen reader text when the alert contains an important warning

skyux_alert_sr_success._description: Screen reader text when the alert indicates a success status

skyux_alert_sr_warning._description: Screen reader text when the alert contains a warning

skyux_help_inline_button_title._description: The title for the help button.

skyux_label_sr_attention._description: Screen reader text when the label contains info that needs attention

skyux_label_sr_caution._description: Screen reader text when the label contains info that needs caution

skyux_label_sr_completed._description: Screen reader text when the label indicates a completed status

skyux_label_sr_danger._description: Screen reader text when the label contains info with a danger status

skyux_label_sr_error._description: Screen reader text when the label contains an error

skyux_label_sr_important_info._description: Screen reader text when the label contains important information

skyux_label_sr_important_warning._description: Screen reader text when the label contains an important warning

skyux_label_sr_success._description: Screen reader text when the label indicates a success status

skyux_label_sr_warning._description: Screen reader text when the label contains a warning

skyux_status_indicator_sr_attention._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator needs attention

skyux_status_indicator_sr_caution._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator needs caution

skyux_status_indicator_sr_completed._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator is a completed indicator

skyux_status_indicator_sr_danger._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator indicates danger

skyux_status_indicator_sr_error._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator is an error indicator

skyux_status_indicator_sr_important_info._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator has important information

skyux_status_indicator_sr_important_warn._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator has an important warning

skyux_status_indicator_sr_success._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator indicates success

skyux_status_indicator_sr_warning._description: Screen reader text when the status indicator is a warning indicator

skyux_tokens_dismiss_button_title._description: The default text for the token dismiss button title.

skyux_wait_aria_alt_text._description: The default alt text for a non-blocking section wait component.

skyux_wait_blocking_aria_alt_text._description: The default alt text for a blocking section wait component.

skyux_wait_page_aria_alt_text._description: The default alt text for a non-blocking page wait component.
